text: mariyu varini samudrapu ala, meghanga kram'mukunnappudu, varu paripurna bhaktito allah ne vedukuntaru. Kani ayana varini raksinci odduku cercina taruvata varilo kondaru (visvasa-avisvasala) madhya agipotaru. Mariyu ma sucanalanu, kevalam visvasaghatakulu, krtaghnulaina varu matrame, tiraskaristaru
